Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Kill luminescence and stay close to boss

Trigger.Name: Lock Last Boss
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}00:0839:The Forsworn Promise will be sealed off in 15 seconds!

Trigger.Name: Unlock Last Boss
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}00:0839:The Forsworn Promise is no longer sealed!

Trigger.Name: Dragon's Voice
Trigger.RegularExpression: 2b:The chimera begins casting The Dragon's Voice

Trigger.Name: Ram's Voice
Trigger.RegularExpression: 2b:The chimera begins casting The Ram's Voice

Trigger.Name: Doom
Trigger.RegularExpression: (1A|1E):[\w]{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) (?<effect>(gains|loses)) the effect of Doom from Teratotaur

Trigger.Name: Eye Of The Beholder - Go Behind
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:277:Coincounter starts using Eye Of The Beholder on Coincounter

Trigger.Name: Kill Second Boss - Use Return
Trigger.RegularExpression: 0839:The Yellow Hall is no longer sealed!

Trigger.Name: Chyme
Trigger.RegularExpression: 03:[\w]+:Added new combatant Chyme Of The Mountain

Trigger.Name: Burning Chains
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of *.Burning Chains.

Trigger.Name: Book Glow
Trigger.RegularExpression: The demon tome begins to glow...

Trigger.Name: Void Call
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Everliving Bibliotaph begins casting Void Call.

Trigger.Name: Seduce
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:1F7A:Ruby Princess starts using Seduce on Ruby Princess

Trigger.Name: Mad Stare
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:1F82:Shisui Yohi starts using Mad Stare on Shisui Yohi

Trigger.Name: Wile of the Tengu
Trigger.RegularExpression: Otengu casts Wile of the Tengu

Trigger.Name: Imp Choir
Trigger.RegularExpression: 2b:Aenc Thon, Lord of the Lengthsome Gait readies Imp Choir

Trigger.Name: Toad Choir
Trigger.RegularExpression: 2b:Aenc Thon, Lord of the Lengthsome Gait readies Toad Choir

Trigger.Name: Last boss buster Buster
Trigger.RegularExpression: 2b:Aenc Thon, Lord of the Lengthsome Gait readies Crippling Blow

Trigger.Name: AoE
Trigger.RegularExpression: 2b:Aenc Thon, Lord of the Lengthsome Gait readies Virtuosic Capriccio

Trigger.Name: First boss Buster
Trigger.RegularExpression: 2b:Aenc Thon, Lord of the Lingering Gaze readies Candy Cane

Trigger.Name: heat side
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:(?<heatside>3C8E|3C8D):Lozatl starts using Heat Up on Lozatl

Trigger.Name: Second Boss Buster - Catechism
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3D09:Forgiven Whimsy starts using Catechism on Forgiven Whimsy

Trigger.Name: Mortal Flame
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Mortal Flame from Lugus

Trigger.Name: Shadowbolt - First Boss TB
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4769:Seeker Of Solitude starts using Shadowbolt on (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21})

Trigger.Name: Storm Of Color - Second Boss TB
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:471B:Leannan Sith starts using Storm Of Color on (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21})

Trigger.Name: Luminour Ray
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4E26:Unknown starts using Luminous Ray on Unknown

Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4B56:Kyklops starts using Raging Glower on Kyklops

Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4B57:Kyklops starts using Eye Of The Cyclone on Kyklops

Trigger.Name: Mysterious Light
Trigger.RegularExpression: The palace pot readies Mysterious Light.

Trigger.RegularExpression: Gozu uses Eye of the Fire.

Trigger.Name: Hound out of Hell (WIP)
Trigger.RegularExpression: Kenko readies Hound out of Hell.

Trigger.RegularExpression: The heavenly naga readies Calcifying Mist.

Trigger.RegularExpression: The heavenly tengu casts Wile of the Tengu.

Trigger.RegularExpression: You sense the Accursed Hoard calling you...

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:39AB:Azulmagia starts using The Ram's Voice on Azulmagia
